data.title: Maranello Executive Search
data.text:
Top qualities: Great Results, Personable, High Integrity

“I have known and worked with Rebecca for a number of years, and I highly recommend Rebecca and Maranello and the services they provide. Rebecca has a wonderful ability to ‘think outside the box’ and deliver bespoke solutions. She truly works as a business partner and has become a valuable asset to the growth of my business. Her knowledge and contacts within the industry across Europe and beyond are impressive; as is her well founded reputation for honesty, integrity and professionalism. Rebecca will always be the first contact I make when looking to hire or be hired!”

Top qualities: Great Results, Expert, High Integrity

“We worked with Maranello on a challenging assignment to place an individual able to operate successfully in a remote working environment. They proved extremely capable in not only understanding our business needs for the role, but also in grasping our business culture and what would be a good fit for us. They were able to present five equally strong candidates in a relatively short period and worked very effectively in managing the interview process through to final selection. Good communicators, with great attention to detail and a willingness to listen and think on our behalf sets them apart from other recruiters we have used.”

Top qualities: Personable, Expert, Great Results

“I want to thank you, for bringing to us, what I feel is an ideal match for the position that we are offering. I do not know how you did it, but I think this is one of the best pairing of a candidate to a job description that I have ever seen”

Top qualities: Personable, Expert, High Integrity

“I have worked with Rebecca and Maranello for over 10 years in the recruitment sector. Rebecca makes the recruitment process a pleasure. The key point is that Rebecca immediately understands the requirement and scope for a candidate and that makes my life so much easier, time is important in today’s business life and any saving is gratefully received. I can recommend Rebecca wholeheartedly for any recruitment engagement as she will deliver beyond expectations. Don’t hesitate in utilising her years of experience”

Top qualities: Great Results, Personable, High Integrity

“I got in contact with Maranello when I saw a posting of an interesting job. Throughout the process with interviews until I actually started the job Rebecca was most helpful, gave advice and guidance. Even now when I worked for the company for 9 months she has now and then asked me how things are going. Should I hire someone within the business area I am working I will definitely see if Rebecca can help me with the search for good candidates”
